data.text: @abc15 Love the arrogance of people who still think that Covid could be controlled.  It was sadly a deadly virus that was created to kill and it fulfilled its intended purpose.  The CCP is who should be held responsible for the carnage.

@abc15 It should be placed at state Capitol so @dougducey & "public servants" can be reminded of their corruption, criminal negligence, incompetence, & dereliction of duty every time they walk into the building.

A picture should be sent to @AZGOP HQ everyday to remind them too. https://t.co/4za7y7d9AI
